title: Config
description:
Config represents the top-level configuration for credentials management.
It contains repository configurations and consumer definitions.

consumers.description: Consumers defines the consumers and their associated credentials

repositories.description: Repositories contains configuration entries for repositories

type.description: Type specifies the type of the configuration

runtime.Type.$comment: Type represents a structured type with an optional version and a name. It is used to identify the type of an object in a versioned API.
